text:
Hey there, Friends fan! Are you ready for
something really awesome?s

In today's lesson, we'll learn what happened to
Rachel, Ross, Monica, Chandler, Phoebe and Joey,

15 years after the end of the last
episodes of the Friends series,
with the trailer of the new and upcoming Friends movie.
Let's roll the clip!
Alright, alright! I can't do this.
Unfortunately this isn't a real movie.

This trailer was made by a fan and it
only contains clips from other shows and

appearances of the cast over the recent
years.
But, will we ever get to see our favorite 6 New Yorker friends together again, in either a series or movie reunion?

In today's lesson, Lisa Kudrow
and Jennifer Aniston will tell us.

Get ready for a fun and powerful
learning experience.
Hey! Are you a Friends fan?
Well, with our Fluent with Friends course you will learn English with the full episodes of the first two seasons of Friends.

And you can try it for FREE right now,
with our three-part mini-course,

just click up at the top or down
the description below to learn more and sign up.
And if you do, I hope you really enjoy it.

Every single week, we help
learners like you understand fast-speaking natives,

without getting lost,
without missing the jokes,

and without subtitles.
Just like Rajeshwari,
who says that our lessons have helped him to speed up his fluency and you can do that as well,
all you have to do is hit that subscribe button and the bell down below
so you don't miss any of our new lessons.

Are you a Friends fan?
Do you want to learn more
about the making of Friends?
Well, then check out this interview lesson we made where Courtney Cox talks all about it.
I hope you had a lot of fun learning with us today.
Be sure before you go to hit that subscribe button so you don't miss a single one of our new lessons.
Check out our FREE mini-course with Friends,
and be sure to check out this playlist

with a bunch of lessons with
Jennifer Aniston's character Rachel from Friends,
or this other lesson I think you'll like.

and LIVE your English!
